Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your personal information such as in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your personal information as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks which may be carried out by us, the customer or a third party, or for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks (including criminal record checks), always subject to applicable law.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain acquiring or acquired entities:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the EPAM business for which you  work is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM business for which you work (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal information may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new employer, potential new employer, the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With personal information processors:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal information to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"Data Processors\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes, such as third party insurance and benefits providers. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal information, and to process your personal information only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal information transfers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a part of our operations and for the purposes described in this Employee Privacy Notice, we may transfer your personal information to countries where companies, organizations and individuals that we share data with inside or outside of the EPAM Group of Companies are located. In order to provide adequate protection for such personal information transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and appropriate safeguards, including but not limited to data transfers agreements based on the EU standard contractual clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities. For obtaining more information or a copy of the appropriate safeguards, please contact EPAM privacy team at: privacy@epam.com.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
